description:
Maxie is the head of Team Magma.
Maxie appeared in two episodes of the Pok√©mon anime, "Gaining Groudon" and "The Scuffle of Legends". Maxie`s goal was to expand the land of Hoenn believing that if so, the land would be peaceful. But at the end of the latter episode, Maxie realized the errors of his ways and finally changed his beliefs, now believing that the land of Hoenn is supposed to be kept as is.
name: Matsubusa
